title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Integrated ADDIE+UDL Framework for Online English Literature Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and foundational knowledge in literary analysis
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the ADDIE modelâ€™s five phases (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation) to design online literature lesson modules.

Applying UDL principles (multiple means of representation: text/audio/video; multiple means of action/expression: quizzes/discussions/projects; multiple means of engagement: individual/group/gamification), learners develop software lecture materials (slides, practical assignments, assessment tools) supporting three or more learning styles (visual/auditory/kinesthetic) within two weeks.
Through project-based assessment, learners complete a literature analysis portfolio applicable to real-world medical/legal/technical field cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
